NewVerificationCodeSent: The verification code has been sent to your email address.
RegistrationCompleted: Registration completed. A 6-digit code has been sent to your email for verification.
EmailVerified: Email has been verified and the user has been activated.
VerificationCodeResent: A new verification code has been sent to your email address.
PhoneInvalid: Phone number is not in a valid format.
PasswordMinLength: Password length must be at least 8.
PasswordUppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.
PasswordLowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.
PasswordSpecialCharRequired: Password must contain at least 1 special character.
PasswordConfirmationNotMatch: Password and password confirmation do not match.
EmailInvalid: Email is not in a valid format.
NotRegistered: No registration found for this email.
VerificationCodeAlreadySent: A verification code has already been sent to this email.
VerificationCodeExpired: The code has expired. Please resend the code.
